post:
We have offers for VM in Norway and South Korea at low-end pricing ($7/month)

In Norway, we have:

- L3/L4 DDoS Protection (Arbor Peakflow scrubbing centers in Copenhagen, Stockholm, and Oslo for high performance).
- Fully redundant network with bonded LACP on NICs and HSRP via Cisco switches.
- 100% powered by renewable energy in a state of the art ISO Certified DC with UPS, high-grade security, fire protection, HVAC cooling, and EM protection.
- Residential ISP with low latency to Europe, East Asia and USA.

<b>VM in Norway:</b>

CPU: 1 core (Intel E3 v6)
RAM: 1GB DDR4
Storage: 15GB RAID 10
Traffic: 1TB per month with Anti-DDoS.
Dedicated IPs: 1 + optional IPv6
Virtualisation: KVM
Location: Oslo, Norway
Order: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=25
PROMO CODE: LOWEND

<b>VM in South Korea:</b>

CPU: 1 core (Intel E5)
RAM: 768MB
Storage: 10GB SSD RAID 10
Traffic: 1TB per month @ 1Gbps
Dedicated IPs: 1
Virtualisation: KVM
Location: Seoul, South Korea
Order: https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=133

For VMs in Khabarovsk (Russian Far East), please see https://xhostfire.com/cart.php?gid=14
Novosibirsk Siberia is also available with large amounts of traffic.

Network:

ISP in Norway - TDC (Tele Denmark) AS3292
ISP in Korea - KT Corporation AS4766 
ISP in Novosibirsk Siberia - Rostelecom AS12389.
ISP in Khabarovsk - Wargaming blend (RT, TTK, Megafon, MTS, Beeline).
ISP in Espoo, Finland - FNE-Finland/DNA Oy Blend.

Test IPs on request. IPs in Norway and Novosibirsk have residential WHOIS (ex-DSL).
CentOS 8 64 bit OS available after order in control panel.

Thank you!

*DDoS protection only available in Norway. <b>This is an unique offer as we are the only provider in Norway to provide Anti-DDoS at low prices.</b>
